Author: Harj
Content: Advertising in general is hard to do well. Just throwing up standard "click on our site" banner ads won't have good click through rates wherever you put them up. We had good success with our fb flyers by keeping them topical and interesting - it was written about here: http://www.trendcatching.com/2006/12/ycombinator_sta.html

Author: gleb
Content:
Very impressive. When did you guy start to work on this?

Suggestion -- Quicktime plugin is not universally installed, and you target audience is not just Apple users (see your Google Analytics report). Use Flash.

Author: startupper
Content:
So FB makes:

15.8x10^9(pageviews/month)x0.01x0.04/100 + 0.25x15.8x10^6 = $4x10^6 per month on ads?

So their annual revenue is just under $50x10^6 or $50 million.

Note: this assumes one ad per page.
